original_text: and you who are in the other two companies that normally go off Sabbath duty are all to guard the temple for the king.
korean_text: 안식일에 나가는 너희 중 두 대는 여호와의 성전을 주의하여 지켜 왕을 호위하되

sentences.original_text: and you who are in the other two companies
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 두 부대에 있는 너희는

sentences.original_text: that normally go off Sabbath duty
are all to guard the temple
